name: Investigate Concurrent login from different geo location
description: Investigates alerts of type ‘Concurrent Login’ by checking if the source IP address is in the specified CIDR range, and then performs remediation tasks based on the result.

steps.name: Notify User Login disable for one hour

message.content:
Received approval from IT Team and user account is disabled.

Email is sent to User with subject "{{vars.result.subject}}"

resource.subject: Account is disable for 1 hour

resource.playbookname: Investigate Concurrent login from different geo location

steps.name: Match Source IP in Internal CIDR

resource.content:
Source IP:

  • {{vars.item[0].attributes.srcIpAddr}}
    • is Internal and therfore benign
Source IP {{vars.item[0].attributes.srcIpAddr}} is External

Below are end user's Detais found on AD :

  • Name: {{vars.steps.Retrieve_Users_Details_From_AD.data.entries[0].attributes.name}}
  • Email Address: {{vars.steps.Retrieve_Users_Details_From_AD.data.entries[0].attributes.mail}}
  • Manager Name: {{vars.steps.Retrieve_Manager_Email_Address.data.entries[0].attributes.name}}
  • Manager's Email Address: {{vars.steps.Retrieve_Manager_Email_Address.data.entries[0].attributes.mail}}

message.content: User {{vars.userid}} Account is Disabled for 1 hour
Reset the User Password after an Hour

steps.name: Send Email to Manager and IT

message.content: Notified User, Manager, IT Team about Password Reset though Email, please check communications for more details.

resource.body:
Hello Team


We have observed Multiple Concurrent Login Attempt for User : {{vars.username}} and We Reset The password for the user. Thank you.
resource.subject: Notify User, Manager, IT Team about Password Reset

conditions.step_name: Notify User Login disable for one hour

resource.content: **User Not Approved to Disable the {{vars.username}} Login.**

arguments.operationTitle: FSR: Parse CEF String to JSON.

steps.name: Add Note to Alert with searched data

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

steps.name: check if Login Attempted in last 10 min

conditions.step_name: Add note for login is not attempted

resource.content: Observed that login is attempted for last an hour

steps.name: Add note for login is not attempted

resource.content: Observed that login is not attempted for last an hour
Sent Approval Request To **IT Team** to Disable User Account
Automation workflow snoozed for an hour, Post that we will query for any successfull login attempt

routes.name: Start -> Configurations
Match Source IP in Internal CIDR -> Is Source IP internal
Configurations -> Start Investigation
Start Investigation -> Match Source IP in Internal CIDR
Is Source IP internal -> Create Note for Internal IP
routes.label: Internal

routes.name: Is Source IP internal -> Create Note for External IP
routes.label: External

routes.name: Retrieve Users Details From AD -> Retrieve Manager Email Address
Retrieve Manager Email Address -> Add Note for User Details
Reset Password -> Notify Manager about Password Reset
Notify User Login disable for one hour -> Disable User Login
Send Approval for Login Disable -> Check if Approved
Check if Approved -> Notify User Login disable for one hour
routes.label: Approved

routes.name: Check if Approved -> Add Note for Not Approved
routes.label: Not Approved

routes.name: Create Note for External IP -> Retrieve Users Details From AD
convert CEF to json -> Add Note to Alert with searched data
Add Note for User Details -> searching users 4 hours of login data in fortisiem
check if Login Attempted in last 10 min -> Check if Login Attempted
Add Note for Login Attempt -> Reset Password
Add note for login is not attempted -> Reset Password
Check if Login Attempted -> Add Note for Login Attempt
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Check if Login Attempted -> Add note for login is not attempted
routes.label: No

routes.name: Wait for 1 hour -> check if Login Attempted in last 10 min
Add Note to Alert with searched data -> Add Note for Approval
Add Note for Approval -> Send Approval for Login Disable
Disable User Login -> Add note for pause
Add note for pause -> Wait for 1 hour
Search users 4 hours of login data in fortisiem -> convert CEF to json
